summary: CONSUMER HAD RECALL 02V323000 REMEDIED IN 03/03. THE AIRBAG WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED AGAIN AND THE CONSUMER WAS VERY CONCERNED FOR HER SAFETY.   *AK   THE AIR BAG LIGHT CAME ON WHILE DRIVING.  THE AIR BAG LIGHT STAYED ON FOR TWO DAYS.  THE DEALER STATED THEY WERE UNABLE TO DO ANYTHING ABOUT IT UNLESS IT HAD COME BACK ON. *SCC  THE POWER WINDOW FAILED TO ROLL DOWN.*JB
